pages.index: WallDecorIndia - Premium Wallpapers & Wall Coverings for Indian Homes Home About us Our Services Catalog Feedbacks Get in touch Call us Wallpapers & Wall Coverings for Indian Homes View catalog Floral Elegance Bring the beauty of nature indoors with our exquisite floral wallpaper designs. Inspired by traditional Indian motifs, these patterns will add a touch of timeless elegance to any room. Geometric Wonders Explore our collection of geometric wallpapers that blend symmetry and creativity. These modern designs are perfect for adding depth and visual interest to your spaces. Elevate Your Living Spaces Discover Timeless Beauty At WallDecorIndia, we believe that wallpapers are more than just decorative elements – they are canvases that bring life and character to your home. Our curated collection draws inspiration from the rich heritage and vibrant cultures of India, offering you a chance to surround yourself with timeless beauty. From the intricate floral patterns of Rajasthan to the geometric motifs of Mughal architecture, our designs capture the essence of India's diverse artistic traditions, allowing you to create a truly unique and personalized environment. Unmatched Quality and Variety Whether you prefer the delicate elegance of floral patterns, the bold statements of geometric designs, or the soothing textures of natural motifs, our extensive range of wallpapers caters to every taste and style. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, our products are not only visually stunning but also durable and easy to maintain. From washable and moisture-resistant options for bathrooms and kitchens to eco-friendly and breathable alternatives for living areas, we ensure that our wallpapers are practical and long-lasting, without compromising on aesthetic appeal. Shop now Our Services At WallDecorIndia, we offer a comprehensive range of services to ensure your wallpapering experience is seamless and stress-free. From expert consultation to professional installation, we're with you every step of the way. Get in touch Personalized Consultation Our experienced design consultants will work closely with you to understand your style preferences and space requirements, helping you select the perfect wallpaper that complements your vision. Samples and Swatches Explore our extensive collection of wallpaper samples and swatches, allowing you to touch and feel the textures, colors, and patterns before making your final decision. Professional Installation Our team of skilled installers will ensure a flawless application of your chosen wallpaper, paying attention to every detail for a seamless, high-quality finish. Care and Maintenance We provide comprehensive guidance on caring for and maintaining your wallpapers, ensuring their longevity and vibrant appearance for years to come. Order Floral Delight ₹1,299 / Roll Order Geometric Maze ₹1,499 / Roll Order Tropical Paradise ₹1,199 / Roll Order Mughal Motifs ₹1,699 / Roll Order Textured Elegance ₹1,399 / Roll Order Paisley Perfection ₹1,599 / Roll What Does the Customer Have to Say? WallDecorIndia has completely transformed our home! The floral wallpaper we selected for our living room is absolutely breathtaking. The colors and patterns are so vibrant and intricate, it truly feels like we've brought a piece of India's rich heritage into our space. The installation process was seamless, and the team was incredibly professional and helpful. - Anjali & Rahul, Delhi I recently renovated my bathroom and wanted a wallpaper that could withstand moisture while still looking stylish. WallDecorIndia's selection of washable and water-resistant wallpapers was exactly what I needed. The geometric pattern I chose has added such a unique touch to the space, and it's so easy to clean and maintain. - Nitin, Mumbai As a lover of traditional Indian designs, I was absolutely delighted with the wallpapers from WallDecorIndia. The intricate paisley patterns and rich colors have brought so much character and warmth to my home office. The quality is exceptional, and the installation team did an impeccable job. Highly recommended for anyone seeking authentic Indian aesthetics. - Meera, Bengaluru I was skeptical about using wallpaper in my home, but WallDecorIndia's eco-friendly and breathable options put my mind at ease. The textured wallpaper we chose for our bedroom has added such a cozy and inviting ambiance. The customer service was excellent, and they guided us through the entire process, from selection to installation. - Aditya & Priya, Hyderabad As a business owner, I wanted to create a welcoming and inspiring environment for my team and clients. WallDecorIndia's modern geometric wallpapers were the perfect choice for our office spaces. The bold patterns have added a touch of sophistication and energy, making a lasting impression on everyone who visits. - Arjun, Pune I cannot praise WallDecorIndia enough for their exceptional service and stunning product range. The tropical-inspired wallpaper I chose for my living room has transformed the space into a serene and tranquil oasis. The colors are so vivid and the patterns are truly captivating. I'm already planning my next project with them! - Neha, Kolkata I accept privacy policy Send message JE11A FIRST FLOOR, opp. TIKONA PARK, Malviya Nagar, New Delhi, Delhi 110017, India +91 98 1103 9383 walldecorindia@gmail.com Home About us Our Services Catalog Feedbacks Get in touch Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions
pages.privacy: WallDecorIndia - Premium Wallpapers & Wall Coverings for Indian Homes | Privacy Policy Home About us Our Services Catalog Feedbacks Get in touch Call us Privacy Policy At WallDecorIndia, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting the personal information you share with us. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you visit our website or make a purchase. Information We Collect We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and shipping address when you place an order or sign up for our newsletter. We also collect non-personal information, such as your IP address and browsing behavior, for analytical purposes. Use of Information We use your personal information to process and fulfill orders, communicate with you about your purchases, and provide customer support. We may also use your email address to send promotional offers and newsletters, but you can opt-out at any time. Non-personal information is used to improve our website and enhance your shopping experience. Data Security We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, or misuse. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, so we cannot guarantee absolute security. Third-Party Disclosure We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your information with trusted service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting business, or servicing you, as long as they agree to keep your information confidential. Your Rights You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information stored by us. You can also request that we restrict or object to the processing of your personal data. If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at walldecorindia@gmail.com. This Privacy Policy is subject to change, and any updates will be posted on our website. Your continued use of our website after any modifications constitutes your acceptance of the revised Privacy Policy. By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. Please read them carefully before placing an order or using our services. Use of Website Our website and its contents are provided for informational and commercial purposes only. You agree to use our website in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations. Any unauthorized use, reproduction, or distribution of our website content is strictly prohibited. Product Information We strive to provide accurate product descriptions, images, and pricing information on our website. However, errors may occur, and we reserve the right to correct any inaccuracies or update information at any time without prior notice. Ordering and Payment By placing an order on our website, you represent that the information provided is accurate and complete. We accept various payment methods, including credit/debit cards, net banking, and other secure online payment gateways. Your order is subject to our acceptance and availability of products. Shipping and Delivery We strive to deliver your order within the estimated time frame, but delays may occur due to unforeseen circumstances. Delivery times are subject to product availability and your location. We are not responsible for any delays caused by factors outside our control. Returns and Refunds If you are not satisfied with your purchase, you may return the unused and undamaged products within 14 days of delivery for a refund or exchange. Any return shipping costs are the responsibility of the customer. Refunds will be processed using the original payment method. Intellectual Property All content on our website, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of WallDecorIndia or its licensors and is protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. Limitation of Liability WallDecorIndia shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising from the use or inability to use our website or products. Our liability, if any, shall be limited to the amount paid for the products or services in question. Governing Law These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. Any disputes arising from these Terms and Conditions shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in India. We reserve the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time without prior notice. Your continued use of our website after any modifications constitutes your acceptance of the revised Terms and Conditions.
